p: Data required for this study were compiled from various sources. The hydro-meteorological data (daily precipitation, maximum and minimum temperature, daily solar radiation and wind) were obtained from: (1) the WLRC in Addis Abeba; (2) the National Meteorological Agency (NMA) of Ethiopia; and (3) the Climate Forecast System Reanalysis (CFSR) of the National Centres for Environment Prediction (NCEP).
